languages.text: "В вопросе колдовства суд руководствуется презумпцией виновности".
"In the case of sorcery, the court operates on the presumption of guilt."

languages.text: "Was die Hexerei betrifft, geht das Gericht von einer Schuldvermutung aus."

languages.text: « Dans les cas de sorcellerie, la cour assume une présomption de culpabilité. »
languages.original_text: "In the case of sorcery, the court operates on the presumption of guilt."

languages.text: “所有涉及巫术的案件，法庭都会进行有罪推定。”
languages.original_text: "In the case of sorcery, the court operates on the presumption of guilt."

traits.locale_text: “所有涉及巫术的案件，法庭都会进行有罪推定。”

languages.text: «En caso de hechicería, el tribunal sigue la presunción de culpabilidad».
languages.original_text: "In the case of sorcery, the court operates on the presumption of guilt."

traits.locale_text: «En caso de hechicería, el tribunal sigue la presunción de culpabilidad».

languages.text: 「魔術に関する場合、この法廷では有罪を前提として裁かれます」
languages.original_text: "In the case of sorcery, the court operates on the presumption of guilt."

traits.locale_text: 「魔術に関する場合、この法廷では有罪を前提として裁かれます」

languages.text: "Sahirlik davalarında mahkeme, suçluluk karinesi kapsamında hareket eder."
languages.original_text: "In the case of sorcery, the court operates on the presumption of guilt."
